item.title: TIL: Firefox Bookmarks Export - HTML to PLAIN File
item.description: Today I Learned Long long time ago, I started using browser bookmarks and the burden of carrying around them system to system has been a pain. I hope, there are people like me, want to carry forward the legacy bookmarks to beyond. I’m not going to be giving the steps for exporting the bookmarks from firefox, as they are already straight forward. Still, if somebody needs help, please look - here .
